Title: Drupal core Denial of Service vulnerability
Description:
The Comment module allows users to reply to comments. In certain cases, an attacker could make comment reply requests that would trigger a denial of service (DOS).

Sites that do not use the Comment module are not affected.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 8.0.0 before 10.1.8, all versions starting from 10.2.0 before 10.2.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 10.1.8 before 10.2.0, all versions starting from 10.2.2
